mainEntity.name: Is Cognism better than ZoomInfo for European data?

acceptedAnswer.text: For EMEA markets, Cognism generally provides better coverage and GDPR compliance than ZoomInfo. Cognism's phone-verified mobile numbers and built-in do-not-call registry checks make it the preferred choice for European prospecting.
Cognism does not publish pricing. All plans require a sales call. Based on public reports, pricing typically starts around $15,000-25,000 per year depending on team size and data access needs.

mainEntity.name: Does Cognism have a Chrome extension?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, Cognism offers a Chrome extension for LinkedIn prospecting that surfaces verified emails and phone-verified mobile numbers directly from LinkedIn profiles.

hero.h1: Cognism: EMEA-Focused B2B Data & Prospecting Platform

org.verdict: Strong EMEA data with enterprise compliance

rep.verdict: Chrome extension useful but limited self-serve

quickSummary.whatItDoes: EMEA-focused B2B data provider with phone-verified mobile numbers, GDPR-compliant prospecting, and do-not-call registry checks built in.
quickSummary.bestFor: Sales teams prospecting in UK and European markets who need GDPR-compliant contact data with verified mobile numbers.
quickSummary.pricing: Custom pricing only. Requires sales call. Typically $15K–25K/year based on public reports.

paragraphs: Cognism is a B2B sales intelligence platform built around EMEA data coverage, phone-verified mobile numbers, and GDPR compliance. It combines a contact database, Chrome extension for LinkedIn prospecting, and intent data signals to help sales teams find and reach European decision-makers with verified contact details.
whatIs.noteHtml: Note: Based on vendor docs and G2 reviews, not firsthand testing. See Cognism on G2.

features.title: Phone-Verified Mobiles
features.description: Human-verified mobile numbers with 98% accuracy claim for direct dials.

features.title: GDPR Compliance Built In
features.description: Do-not-call registry checks and GDPR data processing compliance by design.

features.title: Chrome Extension
features.description: LinkedIn prospecting with real-time contact enrichment from profiles.

features.title: Intent Data
features.description: Bombora-powered intent signals to identify in-market accounts.

features.title: CRM Integration
features.description: Native Salesforce, HubSpot, Outreach, and Salesloft connectors.

features.title: EMEA Data Coverage
features.description: Strongest coverage for UK, DACH, Nordics, and Benelux markets.

pricing.note: Cognism does not publish pricing. All plans require a sales call. Estimates from public sources.
pricing.creditNote: Cognism uses a seat-based licensing model. Credit allocation depends on plan tier and negotiated contract terms.

g2Reviews.intro: Based on 700+ reviews on G2 (4.6/5 rating):

pros.text: Best-in-class coverage for UK and European markets
Direct dial accuracy significantly higher than competitors
Built-in do-not-call checks reduce legal risk
LinkedIn integration works smoothly for daily prospecting
Responsive CSMs and onboarding team praised frequently

cons.text: Weaker coverage for North American contacts vs. ZoomInfo
Sales process required; hard to budget without a call
No AI enrichment or writing tools like newer competitors
Bulk export restrictions on lower tiers frustrate power users
Search and filtering can be slow with complex queries

goodFit.heading: Good Fit If You:
items: Prospect primarily in UK and European markets
Need GDPR-compliant contact data with DNC checks
Value phone-verified mobile numbers for cold calling
Have budget for enterprise B2B data tools
Want intent data to prioritize in-market accounts

notAFit.heading: Likely Not a Fit If You:
items: Prospect primarily in North America (ZoomInfo or Apollo may be better)
Need self-serve pricing without a sales call
Want AI-powered enrichment or writing features
Budget is under $15K/year for data tools

verdict.bestFor: Sales teams focused on EMEA markets who need GDPR-compliant B2B data with phone-verified mobile numbers and intent signals.
verdict.avoidIf: You prospect primarily in North America or need self-serve pricing and AI enrichment features.
verdict.bottomLine: Cognism is the go-to B2B data provider for European prospecting — phone-verified mobiles and native GDPR compliance are genuine differentiators, but US data coverage lags behind ZoomInfo and Apollo.

org.explain: Strong EMEA data coverage and enterprise compliance make it valuable for organizations with European GTM motions.

individual.explain: Chrome extension is useful for daily prospecting, but the lack of self-serve access and limited AI features create friction for solo reps.

decisionSnapshot.intro: Scores from 0–10 based on our scoring methodology.

rows.notes: SOC 2 compliant; GDPR-ready; SSO available on enterprise plans

evidence.text: Enterprise reviewers confirm SOC 2 compliance and data governance features
GDPR data processing compliance documented; DPA available
Mid-market and enterprise users praise compliance features
SSO and team management confirmed on enterprise tiers

rows.notes: Chrome extension installs easily; platform setup requires onboarding call

evidence.text: Chrome extension rated highly for ease of use; platform UI less intuitive
Users report 1-2 weeks for full team onboarding
Dedicated onboarding process with CSM for all new customers
Search and filtering have a learning curve for advanced use cases

rows.notes: Limited AI features; data quality and verification over AI enrichment

evidence.text: No AI writing or enrichment features mentioned in reviews
Focus on human-verified data rather than AI-generated insights
Users note Cognism lacks the AI features found in Clay or Apollo

rows.notes: Native Salesforce, HubSpot, Outreach, Salesloft connectors; API available

evidence.text: Salesforce integration rated 4.5/5 across enterprise reviewers
Native connectors for Salesforce, HubSpot, Outreach, Salesloft, Pipedrive
CRM sync reliability praised; occasional sync delays reported
API access available for custom integrations on higher tiers

rows.notes: No public pricing; all plans require a sales conversation

evidence.text: Multiple reviewers flag lack of transparent pricing as a barrier
Pricing estimates range from $15K-25K/year based on user reports
Several reviews mention pricing is only available via sales team

rows.notes: Enterprise-grade; handles large team deployments across EMEA regions

evidence.text: Enterprise customers report successful 50+ seat deployments
Case studies reference Fortune 500 and large mid-market deployments
Scales well for EMEA-focused teams; US teams may need supplementary data

evidenceSignals.confidenceNote: Based on G2 reviews, vendor documentation, and community discussions. Fewer public reviews compared to US-focused competitors like Apollo or ZoomInfo, but signal quality is solid for EMEA use cases.

evidenceGrid.text: Review sentiment: Praise: EMEA data quality and phone-verified mobiles. Complaint: US data gaps and no public pricing
Community workflows: LinkedIn prospecting, EMEA cold calling, CRM enrichment
Demo-verified: Chrome extension, search filters, CRM sync, intent data signals
Docs verified: Integration docs, GDPR compliance, phone verification methodology

strengthThemes: EMEA data quality unmatched by US competitors
Phone-verified mobile numbers reduce bounce rates
Built-in GDPR and DNC compliance reduces legal risk
limitationThemes: US and APAC data coverage lags behind ZoomInfo
No public pricing creates friction for budget planning
Limited AI features compared to newer platforms
evidenceSignals.disagreeNote: ⚠️ Where sources disagree: G2 reviewers praise data quality broadly; Reddit users note specific gaps in US SMB data. Vendor claims 98% mobile accuracy; independent validation is limited.

userVoiceThemes.heading: Phone-verified mobiles change the cold calling game
userVoiceThemes.synthesis: The most consistent praise across platforms: Cognism's phone-verified mobile numbers deliver significantly higher connect rates than competitors. Users report 2-3x more conversations per dial session compared to ZoomInfo or Apollo mobile data.
userVoiceThemes.quote: "Cognism's verified mobiles are the reason we switched from ZoomInfo. Our connect rates went from 4% to 12% on cold calls to EMEA prospects."
userVoiceThemes.quoteCite: Synthesized from G2 and TrustRadius review themes

userVoiceThemes.heading: US data coverage is a real gap
userVoiceThemes.synthesis: The most frequent complaint: Cognism's North American data doesn't match ZoomInfo or Apollo in coverage or accuracy. Teams prospecting across both EMEA and US markets often need a supplementary data source for their US territories.
userVoiceThemes.quote: "Fantastic for our UK and DACH territories, but we still need Apollo for US prospecting. The coverage gap is real for North American SMBs."
userVoiceThemes.quoteCite: Synthesized from G2 and TrustRadius review themes

userVoiceThemes.heading: GDPR compliance removes legal friction
userVoiceThemes.synthesis: European sales teams consistently highlight Cognism's built-in GDPR compliance and DNC registry checks as genuine differentiators. Compliance teams appreciate not having to build manual processes around data usage, and legal risk reduction is a major purchase driver.
userVoiceThemes.quote: "Our legal team approved Cognism in two weeks. With ZoomInfo, the GDPR review took three months and we still had to build manual DNC processes."
userVoiceThemes.quoteCite: Synthesized from G2 and TrustRadius review themes

pricingBreakdown.tldr: No public pricing. Requires a sales call. Estimates suggest $15K–25K/year depending on seats and data access.
gotchas: No self-serve signup or free trial available
Annual contracts are standard; monthly billing rarely offered
Phone-verified mobiles (Diamond data) may cost extra vs. standard data
Credit limits vary by contract; overages require renegotiation

greatAt: EMEA data coverage: Best-in-class contact data for UK, DACH, Nordics, and Benelux markets
Phone-verified mobiles: Human-verified direct dials deliver 2-3x higher connect rates
GDPR compliance: Built-in DNC checks and data processing compliance reduce legal risk
Intent data: Bombora-powered signals identify in-market accounts for priority outreach
CRM integration: Native Salesforce, HubSpot, Outreach, and Salesloft connectors
breaksAtScale: US data gaps: North American coverage doesn't match ZoomInfo or Apollo
No public pricing: Budget planning requires a sales conversation
Limited AI features: No AI enrichment, writing, or automation tools
Platform speed: Complex search queries can be slow to return results
Export restrictions: Bulk export limits on lower tiers frustrate power users
whoShouldNotBuy: US-focused teams: ZoomInfo or Apollo provide better North American coverage
Self-serve buyers: No free trial or transparent pricing available
AI-first teams: Clay or Apollo offer more AI-powered enrichment features
Budget-constrained startups: $15K+ annual commitment is steep for early-stage teams

implementationReality.note: Chrome extension works immediately; full platform setup with CRM integration and team onboarding takes 1-2 weeks with dedicated CSM support.

enterpriseReadiness.label: SSO / SAML
enterpriseReadiness.value: Available on Enterprise plan (Okta, Azure AD)

org.heading: Best for Sales Teams & RevOps
items: RevOps teams consolidating European data providers

individual.heading: Best for Individual Reps
items: SDRs and AEs prospecting UK and European accounts
Reps who rely on cold calling and need verified mobile numbers
Individual contributors comfortable with Chrome extension workflows

faqs.question: Is Cognism better than ZoomInfo for European data?
faqs.answer: For EMEA markets, Cognism generally provides better coverage and GDPR compliance. Phone-verified mobiles and DNC checks make it the preferred choice for European prospecting. ZoomInfo remains stronger for US data.

faqs.question: How much does Cognism cost?
faqs.answer: Cognism does not publish pricing. All plans require a sales call. Based on public reports, pricing typically starts around $15K-25K per year depending on team size and data needs.

faqs.question: Does Cognism have a Chrome extension?
faqs.answer: Yes, Cognism offers a Chrome extension for LinkedIn prospecting that surfaces verified emails and phone-verified mobile numbers from LinkedIn profiles.
